body.title: Website v0.7.1
body.description: Very, very, very many visual changes including: back button hover effect changed, back button now hides itself when you scroll down but reappears when you scroll up, paragon stats UI improvements, and Custom Map stats UI improvements. Full details can be found in the Discord server linked under Resources.

body.title: Website v0.7.0: ALL PARAGON STATS
body.description: Every Paragon is here in BTD6 Central 0.7.0 which has finally released. In the Paragon stats page, get all the details you could ever want to know about a Paragon at any Degree, and calculate a degree within a Paragon's menu. Along with this, several other visual changes have been made, including a brand new main font. Full details can be found in the BTD6 Central Discord Server linked below.

links.name: Join the BTD6 Central Discord Server

body.title: Website v0.6.1
body.description: Minor fixes to various places, including a fix to an issue occuring with lots of decimal places. Full notes can be found in the Discord server.

body.title: Website v0.6.0: PLAYER AND CUSTOM MAP LOOKUP
body.description: This update adds the new Community page to the website with Map Lookup and User Lookup. Along with this, many more small changes have been made to various pages on the website, including a new popup animation. If you see an issue, report it to the BTD6 Central Discord Server linked below.

links.name: Join the BTD6 Central Discord Server

body.title: Website v0.5.4
body.description: All stats use percents instead of multipliers (so 0.5x is now listed as 50%), nav bar much smaller, popups no longer let you scroll, and other minor changes and fixes.

body.title: Website v0.5.3
body.description: Added Vortex stats, and made some fixes to incorrect Bloonarius stats.

body.title: Website v0.5.2
body.description: Added stats for Phayze, plus some minor reformatting for Boss stats.

body.title: Website v0.5.1
body.description: Added images for Dreadrock Bloons, plus some other small fixes.

body.title: Website v0.5.0: BLOON STATS
body.description: This update is finally out, giving you access to Bloon and Boss stats (excluding Vortex and Phayze which will be added in the near future). Page Themes have also been added, with plans to add more themes in the future. Several more changes have been made which can be found in the BTD6 Central Discord Server.

links.name: Join the BTD6 Central Discord Server

body.title: BTD6 Central is in Beta! Version 0.4.0
body.description:
After lots of development time, BTD6 Central is finally ready for 'beta.' Check out the event archive using the menu in the top right.
Changes for 0.4.0: New home page, added a hamburger, and dark mode support based on system settings.
